page.title: 20Perceptions of the Future
page.content: The majority of people would like the community to remain unchanged or even to go back to a self-contained village community 'like the old days'. It is the rural way of life, the peace & quiet (the owl hooting is still the loudest noise at night round Ardeley Green) that attracts the newcomers, who are prepared to commute to gain these benefits. But change is unavoidable. A few decades ago the influence of 'the big house' was integral in the village & there was still a touch of feudalism. This is no longer the case & in both Walkern & Ardeley the occupants of the big houses no longer play a central part in the life of the community. If Stansted Airport undergoes major development or if Stevenage expands markedly our communities could have a very different future.
